page.title: 19FOOD
page.content:
Food eaten by a nine year old boy in one day. {Breakfast:}I had strawberry jam on toast and I drank apple juice. ________ Half_way through the morning everybody had a pod of peas from the school garden. {Lunch:}For lunch I went home and had jacket potatoes with cheese. {Dinner/tea:}I had salad with ham and new potatoes, crusty bread and cheese. ________ Later I had a yoghurt.
My favourite food is roast pork.
{Local places to eat:}Haseley Manor, The Arreton Craft Centre, White Lion Public House and the Fighting Cocks Public House.
